channel.title: Case Studies
channel.description: See how advertisers and publishers found affiliate marketing success with these CJ case studies.

item.title: goop Solved for TV Measurement & Saw 170% Increase in New Customer ROAS with CJ
item.description: Lifestyle brand, goop, used CJ’s Clickless Tracking solution to measure sales from a national TV segment, resulting in an impressive number of new customers, new benchmarks for their television marketing efforts, and a way to measure non-traditional digital campaigns moving forward.
item.content:encoded: Lifestyle brand, goop, used CJ’s Clickless Tracking solution to measure sales from a national TV segment, resulting in an impressive number of new customers, new benchmarks for their television marketing efforts, and a way to measure non-traditional digital campaigns moving forward.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Expedia Group & FlipGive Shatter Revenue & Social Impact Goals with Unique Partnership Enabled by CJ
item.description: Expedia Group, the leading traveler technology platform, sees strong results through an innovative affiliate marketing partnership that powered outcomes throughout the customer journey.
item.content:encoded: Expedia Group, the leading traveler technology platform, sees strong results through an innovative affiliate marketing partnership that powered outcomes throughout the customer journey.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: eharmony Leans on CJ's Growth Consultancy Team to Run Successful Search Strategies
item.description: Online dating platform, eharmony, leverages the CJ platform and CJ’s Growth Consultancy team to maximize their opportunity with affiliate customers resulting in a successful TM+ campaign and a fantastic new partnership.
item.content:encoded: Online dating platform, eharmony, leverages the CJ platform and CJ’s Growth Consultancy team to maximize their opportunity with affiliate customers resulting in a successful TM+ campaign and a fantastic new partnership.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Dell India Consumer Affiliate Program Sees Big Growth After Migrating to CJ
item.description: Dell, the global leader in PC and PC-related products, migrated their India-based affiliate program to CJ as part of a global affiliate platform consolidation effort and immediately experienced consistent, high-quality growth in product sales, revenue, and traffic.
item.content:encoded: Dell, the global leader in PC and PC-related products, migrated their India-based affiliate program to CJ as part of a global affiliate platform consolidation effort and immediately experienced consistent, high-quality growth in product sales, revenue, and traffic.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Consumer Electronics Giant Sees Post-Migration Revenue Growth in Global Markets
item.description: A consumer electronics brand worked with CJ to bring all global affiliate performance under one platform, leading to increased revenue growth in five key European markets and increased efficiency, scale, and profitability.
item.content:encoded: A consumer electronics brand worked with CJ to bring all global affiliate performance under one platform, leading to increased revenue growth in five key European markets and increased efficiency, scale, and profitability.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Complete Mobile Tracking through Button PostTap App Partnership Yields Fantastic Results
item.description: When we announced our strategic partnership with Button, we knew that improving the customer shopping experience and enhancing tracking capabilities in mobile environments would lead to improvements in metrics like conversion rate and average order value—but we didn’t know by how much. Now we do!
item.content:encoded: When we announced our strategic partnership with Button, we knew that improving the customer shopping experience and enhancing tracking capabilities in mobile environments would lead to improvements in metrics like conversion rate and average order value—but we didn’t know by how much. Now we do!
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: CJ's Pay Per Call Enhances In-House Call Program & Delivers Record Success
item.description: An international hotel chain migrated their in-house call program to CJ's Pay Per Call solution and achieved greater quality control, streamlined management, and substantial growth.
item.content:encoded: An international hotel chain migrated their in-house call program to CJ's Pay Per Call solution and achieved greater quality control, streamlined management, and substantial growth.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: RS Components Wins Competitive Market Share with Incentive Publishers
item.description: Through a strategy fronted by the tactical use of cashback rates and adjustments to their referral window, RS Components managed to break their competitor’s 16-year dominance in the affiliate channel, grow revenue, and strengthen publisher partnerships.
item.content:encoded: Through a strategy fronted by the tactical use of cashback rates and adjustments to their referral window, RS Components managed to break their competitor’s 16-year dominance in the affiliate channel, grow revenue, and strengthen publisher partnerships.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Norton’s APAC Expansion with CJ Results in Major Growth
item.description: Norton, global leader in cyber safety and security, worked with CJ to expand into the APAC region and experienced growth in sales, new customers, and overall revenue.
item.content:encoded: Norton, global leader in cyber safety and security, worked with CJ to expand into the APAC region and experienced growth in sales, new customers, and overall revenue.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: CJ's Data Science Solution Suite Proves Honey's Ability to Drive Incremental Value
item.description: Honey, a subsidiary of PayPal, offers a popular consumer browser extension that automatically finds and applies coupon codes at checkout with a single click. Deals are also aggregated on their website and mobile app.
item.content:encoded: Honey, a subsidiary of PayPal, offers a popular consumer browser extension that automatically finds and applies coupon codes at checkout with a single click. Deals are also aggregated on their website and mobile app.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Major Service Provider Increases Return & Efficiency with CJ's Affiliate Customer Journey Solution
item.description: A global home and business services brand leveraged CJ’s Affiliate Customer Journey solution to diversify media partners which resulted in increased ROAS and growth in new customer contracts.
item.content:encoded: A global home and business services brand leveraged CJ’s Affiliate Customer Journey solution to diversify media partners which resulted in increased ROAS and growth in new customer contracts.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Consumer Electronics Brand Sees Big Growth from Recruitment & Activation
item.description: A new-to-affiliate consumer electronics advertiser leverages CJ to recruit and activate publishers to grow revenue internationally, demonstrating the importance of publisher recruitment for a diverse portfolio.
item.content:encoded: A new-to-affiliate consumer electronics advertiser leverages CJ to recruit and activate publishers to grow revenue internationally, demonstrating the importance of publisher recruitment for a diverse portfolio.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Abt Uses CJ to Compete Nationally with Big Box Brands
item.description: Drawn to the data-driven, strategic expertise of CJ, Abt migrated a mature affiliate program to the CJ network and saw double-digit revenue growth.

item.title: Olympia Sports Uses CJ to Super-Charge Ecommerce Growth
item.description: New to the ecommerce space, Olympia Sports leveraged the power of affiliate marketing and saw tremendous growth with CJ.

item.title: Shoptagr Leverages CJ’s Publisher Onboarding Team for Rapid Growth
item.description: Cross-platform app publisher, Shoptagr, successfully launched in the CJ network with help from CJ’s Publisher Onboarding team. Shoptagr gained hundreds of new partnerships that led to six straight months of double-digit MOM sales growth.
item.content:encoded: Cross-platform app publisher, Shoptagr, successfully launched in the CJ network with help from CJ’s Publisher Onboarding team. Shoptagr gained hundreds of new partnerships that led to six straight months of double-digit MOM sales growth.
item.dc:creator: CJ

item.title: Retailer Grows Revenue as Direct Result of CJ's Network Quality
item.description: A well-known, global retailer grew their affiliate program by removing non-compliant publishers and investing savings in quality partners.

item.title: Lacoste Grows Key Content Relationships after Migration to CJ
item.description: Lacoste selected CJ to devise and execute a multi-pronged content strategy focused on building the high-end retail brand in order to drive adoption with luxury consumers.

item.title: Health & Wellness Brand Drives Big Growth via Search in Affiliate
item.description: Health and wellness company, Life Extension, surpassed their goals of increased revenue, number of sales, and brand engagement after implementing a search strategy proposed by CJ.
